title: Changes in elasticity along a linear demand curve

content.question: Moving from left to right along a downward- sloping linear demand curve, price elasticity varies in which of the following ways?

choices.label: First unit elastic, then inelastic throughout
First unit elastic, then elastic throughout
First inelastic, then unit elastic throughout
First elastic, then unit elastic, and finally inelastic
First inelastic, then unit elastic, and finally elastic

content.answer: First elastic, then unit elastic, and finally inelastic

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe economic concepts, principles, or models.
